thread.title: A GEM DOWNTOWN
thread.title_full: A GEM DOWNTOWN - Review of Gild Hall, a Thompson Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Dougal M
title: A GEM DOWNTOWN
text:
This is a gem of a hotel with an intimate feel in downtown manhattan. The location is ideal for exploring the areas landmarks, bars and all sorts of eateries.
The hotels rooms are spacious and well equipped.
The bar and restaurant are great.
And the staff, they are just Fantastic.
Room Tip: Just ask for one.... See more room tips
